reviews.review: il gioco è bello e ben fatto, un ottimo modo per passare il tempo o per salire di rank nella modalità competitiva

It's a 'Free to Play' game. I bought it when it was to play and so I got the Loyality Badge. The graphics are not the best, but this game was released in 2012 and there are 500000 people playing it at the moment. It's nice to get some new online friends and to learn aiming for other Shooter.

It's the best game I have ever played on Steam. I have only 444h at the moment, but I'm grinding to Gold Nova and to 1000h

nao jogue sem prime, nao seja toxico, se divirta, o jogo é legal. e se vc for jogar com um pc ruim é extremamente perigoso, riscos altos de vc se viciar, passar raiva e contratar um agiota pra comprar um computador com placa de video dedidacada.
